about.myinfo: I am hardworking, diligent, creative individual. Able to work as a part of a team or alone. An easy-going and friendly person and easy to work with. Able to work under pressure and under different conditions. I have a great desire to become a front-end developer and work in an interesting environment in which I can develop and realize my potential. In my free time I attend additional courses in programming, English, study additional literature and create my first projects.
about.subtitle: 01/03/2020 to 27/12/2020
about.description: Content-writer in creative digital agency 'TrendX'. Duties: creating content, SMM-strategies and publishing posts for social networks. Writing and filling the site with content. Communication and negotiations with clients, assistance in organizing photo shoots.
about.description2: Ð¡ontent manager in IT company 'Lead Line IT'. Duties: creating content-strategy and content-plan for Instagram and Facebook pages for 5-10 clients; analysis of competitors; communication with bloggers; managing and controlling the work of designers, photographers, videographers, editors, models (using Bitrix24); assigning tasks for subordinate employees; organizing and managing photoshoots; creating and controlling the visual aspect of social media pages.

Technical Skills.title: Technical skills
Technical Skills.item1: Basic knowledge of HTML, CSS (Bootstrap), JavaScript
Technical Skills.item3: Availability of GitHub repository with code.

Digital Skills.title: Digital Skills
